import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { useAuth0 } from '@auth0/auth0-react' export default function Sidebar({navBarState,setClickGallery,setQueueOnClick}) { const {isAuthenticated,logout} = useAuth0() const [currentURI,setCurrentURI] = useState(false) const handleSideBarClick = (e) =>{ setCurrentURI((e.target.value === "/profile") ? true: false) } return ( <>
Inventory Check
Dashboard Profile
{isAuthenticated ? logout()}> Sign Out : ""}
) }
